overview: Joanna Angel is busy directing her movie but one disaster happens after the next. Tommy Pistol is late (as usual), the cable guy forgot his tool belt, and no one can remember their lines. To make matters worse, there's a mob of anti-porn protestors that won't leave Joanna alone. Not Another Porn Movie brings you all your fave clich porn characters: the pizza guy, the naughty nurse, the slutty secretary, the unforgettable porno soundtrack. It's a parody of every other porno you've ever seen...just a lot funnier.
title: Not Another Porn Movie
